required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.official_title: Effectiveness of Adhesive Containing MDPB: a Practice-based Clinical Trial

brief_summary.textblock: 9 general practices in the Netherlands were provided with two composite resin adhesives, each for a period of 9 months. One contained MDPB (Adhesive P), and the other one was used as a control (Adhesive S). Patient's age, SES, and caries risk, as well as tooth type/number, reason for restoration placement, used restorative material and bonding agent, and affected surfaces were recorded. All interventions carried out on these teeth in the next 6 years were extracted from the electronic patient records, along with their date, type, reason, and surfaces. Two dependent variables were defined: general failure, and failure due to secondary caries. All data handling and statistical analyses were carried out in R 4.0.5.

primary_outcome.description: Time in years restoration has survived without needing dental re-intervention

secondary_outcome.description: Incidence of secondary caries leading to replacement of the restoration

arm_group.description: Restoration placed using Clearfil Protect Bond adhesive (Kuraray Noritake, Osaka, Japan) , which contains the antibacterial monomer MDPB (12-Methacryloyloxydodecylpyridiniumbromide)
Restoration placed using Clearfil SEBond adhesive (Kuraray Noritake, Osaka, Japan)

intervention.description: An adhesive is used routinely when placing resin composite restorations. This group receives a commercially available adhesive containing an antibacterial monomer (MDPB)
An adhesive is used routinely when placing resin composite restorations. This group receives a commercially available adhesive.

study_pop.textblock: Patients who visited one of the participating general dental practices during the study period needing at least one dental restoration

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Needing at least one dental restoration
Exclusion Criteria:
- Opted out of data collection

patient_data.ipd_description: Anonimized data will be published in the DANS-easy archive. The study description are available to anyone, and the data are available upon request.
patient_data.ipd_time_frame: Data will become available upon study publication.
patient_data.ipd_access_criteria: Any individual requesting access through the archive will obtain access
